ai.summary: Helston BR 30 is a short, easy 2.6 km hike in the UK. Suitable for beginners and families, the route follows a quiet bridleway with flat terrain and minimal elevation gain.
ai.terrain_summary: The surface is a mix of compacted gravel, paved paths, and occasional grassy edges. Expect muddy stretches after rain; waterproof footwear is advised.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths and watch for occasional road crossings near the route. Check the weather before you go and bring layers, water, and a small first aid kit. The hike is short, but daylight and visibility matter; carry a charged phone.
recommended_gear: Comfortable walking shoes or lightweight hiking boots
Sunscreen and a hat for sunny days
Map or offline GPS / fully charged phone
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; best in dry, mild conditions, though it can be enjoyed year-round with appropriate clothing.

seo.title: Helston BR 30 – Easy 2.6 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Helston BR 30, a short and easy 2.6 km hike in the UK. Perfect for beginners and families seeking a quick, flat stroll along well-maintained paths.
